QueryToExecute:
with analysis as (
  select
    arn,
    title,
    cardinality(array(select jsonb_object_keys(tags))) as num_tag_keys,
    region,
    account_id,
    tags,
    _ctx
  from
    aws_sagemaker_training_job
)
select
  arn as resource,
  case
    when num_tag_keys > $1::integer then 'alarm'
    else 'ok'
  end as status,
  title || ' has ' || num_tag_keys || ' tag(s).' as reason
  
  , region, account_id
from
  analysis;
